1688570.name: V.I.L.E.: Viral Infection Level Event
1688570.description:
V.I.L.E. is a Top-Down Survival-Horror experience. Survive the night as a viral outbreak ravages Red Panda City. Explore various regions including the city streets, the police station, and the town's state of the art hospital while solving puzzles and managing your inventory. Chooses matter in the experience and every decision could cost your fellow survivors their lives and make your escape that much more difficult.

Play as Hank Rhodes, a veteran cop whose primary goal is saving as many lives as he can during the chaos. Hank is joined by his squad and will find various other survivors during the course of the outbreak. His and your decision could affect their lives.

  • Survival Horror - Every bullet counts. Gather supplies as you survive the night. Manage your inventory and upgrade weapons to better your chances against the undead.

  • Exploration - Various maps expand Red Panda City. Explore a police station, hospital, sewers and much more.

  • Choices Matter - At various points in the game, choices you make will affect all those around you. Some choices you might not even realize you made until later in the story.

  • Varied Enemies - The virus has affected people differently. Some blood types cause the virus to mutate and evolve.

  • Difficulty Options - Having trouble with the undead? There are several difficulty settings to choose from.

  • Graphics - Featuring the artwork of VexedEnigma
